title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 351.5 - Certificate of veterinary inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 351.5 - Certificate of veterinary inspection

State Regulations
(a) To qualify for admission to a fair all
deer, llamas, ruminants and swine shall: (1)
be accompanied by an original intrastate or interstate certificate of
veterinary inspection as defined in section
351.1
of this Part which shall be
presented to the commissioner at any time upon request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
351.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
